label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_010
content:
## 2026-01-12 Daily Operations Summary

### Metrics
#### Zone Transfers
- AXFR Requests: 38
- AXFR Success Percentage: 98.1
- IXFR Requests: 218
- IXFR Success Percentage: 99.2
- Transfer Average (ms): 560
- Transfer P95 (ms): 1290
- TSIG Failures: 1

#### TTL Changes
- Records Changed: 46
- Zones Touched: 7
- TTL Minimum (s): 300
- TTL Maximum (s): 86400
- TTL Median (s): 1800
- Rollbacks: 0

#### Propagation
- Cloud Edge Sites: 35
- Propagation Average (s): 74
- Propagation P95 (s): 178
- Stale Answer Percentage: 0.5

#### DNS Queries
- Queries Per Second Average: 21600
- Queries Per Second Peak: 51000
- NX Domain Percentage: 2.1
- Servfail Percentage: 0.06
- UDP Percentage: 96.6
- TCP Fallback Percentage: 1.6

#### DNSSEC
- Zones Signed: 62
- Signing Queue Depth: 2
- Signature Refreshes: 123
- DS Mismatch Count: 0
- Bogus Validation Events: 2

#### Health Checks

#### Change Management

- Changes Failed: 0

#### Cache Behavior

- Negative Cache Hit Percentage: 40.2
- Prefetch Enabled Percentage: 74.0

#### Latency

- Auth Response P95 (ms): 45.6
- EDNS0 Present Percentage: 72.8

#### Errors
- Format Error Count: 11
- Refused Count: 30
- Rate Limited Count: 15
- Truncation TC Percentage: 0.7

#### Capacity
- Zones Total: 576
- Records Total: 2041500
- Dynamic Updates Per Hour: 340

#### Compliance
- Zonefile Lint Errors: 4
- DNSSEC Policy Violations: 0
- Audit Log Gaps: 0

### Infrastructure
#### Bind-Master-01
- CPU Percentage: 36
- Memory Percentage: 64
- Disk Used Percentage: 74
- Net In (Mbps): 92
- Net Out (Mbps): 125
- Open Files: 1340
- NTP Offset (ms): 2

#### Bind-Slave-02
- CPU Percentage: 28
- Memory Percentage: 54
- Disk Used Percentage: 56
- Net In (Mbps): 72
- Net Out (Mbps): 88
- Open Files: 1145
- NTP Offset (ms): 2

#### Cloud-DNS-Sync-01
- CPU Percentage: 56
- Memory Percentage: 71
- Disk Used Percentage: 50
- Net In (Mbps): 110
- Net Out (Mbps): 145
- Queue Depth: 6
- NTP Offset (ms): 1

#### Signer-01
- CPU Percentage: 42
- Memory Percentage: 76
- Disk Used Percentage: 61
- Net In (Mbps): 20
- Net Out (Mbps): 22
- HSM Slot Utilization Percentage: 62
- NTP Offset (ms): 1

### Events
- Post-incident cleanup: standardized TSIG algorithms across remaining zones; confirmed transfer success rates recovered.
- Reduced dynamic update frequency in internal tooling from 60s to 180s where acceptable; saw queue depth and propagation p95 improve.
- Ran SOA serial reconciliation job; only one zone required manual bump due to prior failed change set.
- Updated alert thresholds for signer queue depth based on observed load patterns during update storm.

### On Call
- Shift: T. Kowalski
- Pages: 2
- Tickets: 6
- Status: Recovering; metrics trending back to baseline after configuration standardization.
